name: foundry-telegram
description: Telegram bot with Azure AI Foundry - Your own AI endpoint
setup: 1. Deploy AI Foundry: Use ai-foundry/azuredeploy-foundry.json or Azure Portal
2. Get endpoint URL from AI Foundry portal (Keys and Endpoint)
3. Get API key from same location
notes: Deploy AI Foundry first, then use those credentials here. Or use azuredeploy-fullstack.json to deploy both together.
